name: White Stag Women's Short Sleeve Sleep Lounger Gown

reviews.name: White Stag Women's Short Sleeve Sleep Lounger Gown
reviews.reviewText: smooth fit in bed, no wadding, so comfortable
reviews.title: great fit

reviews.name: White Stag Women's Short Sleeve Sleep Lounger Gown
reviews.reviewText: I bought size 2X which I buy all the time, but this is more like a 4X. I am probably going to just keep it rather than returning it. I will also say the material is just awful. I will stick to my white stag sleep shirts in the future.
reviews.title: poor sizing

reviews.name: White Stag Women's Short Sleeve Sleep Lounger Gown
reviews.title: nice

reviews.name: White Stag Women's Short Sleeve Sleep Lounger Gown
reviews.reviewText: This houserobe is very colorful. It is comfortable and the fit is good. Great for around the house. Washes well.
reviews.title: cute mumu

reviews.name: White Stag Women's Short Sleeve Sleep Lounger Gown
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my Mom as a gift--she said it fits well--is very comfy and washes well--no shrinking or fading
reviews.title: Comfortable and Easy Care
